The archetypal Eldritch Knight⁠⁠ combines the martial mastery common⁠ to all fighters with a careful study of magic. Eldritch Knights use magical Techniques similar to those practiced by wizards. They focus their study on two of the eight schools of magic: Abjuration and Evocation. Abjuration⁠ spells⁠ grant an Eldritch Knigh⁠t⁠ additional Protection in battle, and evocation⁠ spells⁠ deal damage to many foes at once, extending the fighter’s reach in combat⁠. These knights learn a comparatively small number of spells⁠, committing them to memory instead of keeping them in a Spellbook.
